contact.paragraph_1:
The best way to reach me is by e-mail, at contato@andrecarvalho.io.

I’m open to job opportunities, freelance projects, and collaboration with other developers.
contact.name: Name

about.title: About me - Andre Carvalho
about.description: Here you can find more descriptive information about me and my skills.
about.keywords: andre carvalho, andre, carvalho, portfolio, developer, dev, hire, offers, curriculum, solo developer, html, css, javascript, php, c++, github, technology, freelancer, freelance, freelancing
about.about_me_p_1: Hi, I'm Andre Carvalho, a 24-year-old developer from the south of Brazil.
about.about_me_p_2: I've been surrounded by computers for as long as I can remember, and over the years, I've developed a wide range of skills related to technology and digital creation. From image and video editing to 3D modeling and animation in Blender, vector design in Inkscape, and game development with Godot, I've always enjoyed exploring new ways to bring ideas to life through computers.
about.about_me_p_3: I began programming around the age of 17, starting with Python, which helped me build a solid foundation in core programming concepts such as variables, functions, and object-oriented principles. Since then, I've continued expanding my knowledge across different tools, technologies, and programming languages.
about.about_me_p_4: For more details about my technical skills and professional experience, please take a look at my Skill Assessment and CV.
about.p_1: Here is a list of things I know, but not limited to:
about.li_1: HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP.[1]
about.li_8: Knowledge on both Windows and Linux based operating systems.
about.p_2:
I have a solid foundation in programming, so given enough time, I can learn any language, framework, library, etc.

Moreover, I have some experience with UI/UX design as well. This website was designed inside Penpot before I began coding it. All icons were created by me using Inkscape.
about.p_3: For further reference on my knowledge and skills, you can also check my portfolio and Github repositories page.
about.li_1_note: [1] This website's source code is archived in this Github repository, feel free to check it.

cv.title: Curriculum Andre Carvalho Filho
cv.description: Here you will find my curriculum vitae, with my professional experiences, profile summary, and technical skills.
cv.keywords: andre carvalho, andre, carvalho, developer, software, dev, hire, oportunities, work, job, curriculum, freelance, freelancer
cv.origin: My website: andrecarvalho.io
cv.langs_val: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PHP, TypeScript, SQL, Kotlin, C++ (basic), Java (basic), VBA, Powershell, Bash
cv.oth_tools_val: Git, Tailwind CSS, Figma, Penpot, Inkscape
cv.pro_sum_desc:
I'm a software developer, looking for my first opportunity in the Software development industry. My focus is always writing clean, modular and scalable code.

I am seeking challenging opportunities to improve my technical expertise and earn experience in the area. I am fluent both in English and Portuguese.
cv.item1_desc:
I provided technical assistance to partners and internal teams regarding the Cisco Enterprise portfolio. Our support covered a wide range of topics, including differences between DNA subscriptions, supported features and protocols for specific network equipment, transceiver compatibility, and more.

I also worked on creating predictive site surveys using Ekahau. Customers would send us floor plans, and we used the software to design predictive wireless network solutions tailored to their spaces.

After Cisco ended the team I was part of, I was transferred to the Compliance Team (see below).
cv.item2_desc:
As a Compliance Agent, my role was to ensure that services being ordered complied with Cisco's policies and did not fall under their Non-Entitlement Policy.

We inspected network equipment — specifically environmental system commands — to verify that the devices were functioning correctly and were legitimate Cisco products.
